definition: a large number of things or people considered together, to gather together in large numbers
details:
noun
- a large number of things or people considered together
= example: a large number of things or people considered together
- an informal body of friends
= example: an informal body of friends
= synonyms: gang
verb
- to gather together in large numbers
= example: to gather together in large numbers
= synonyms: crowd together
- to cause to herd, drive, or crowd together
= synonyms: herd
- to approach a certain age or speed
= synonyms: push
- to fill or occupy to the point of overflowing
= example: to fill or occupy to the point of overflowing
